<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Leopard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=67)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Leopards are among the smallest of the big cats, yet they are still dangerous creatures to tangle with. Leopard statistics can also be used for black panthers, white-spotted snow leopards, or tawny-coated cougars.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Leopard](/Monsters.aspx?ID=67)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 52</row>

**Perception** +7; low-light vision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +8

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** -4

**Wis** +1

**Cha** -2
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +5 

</row>

**HP** 30

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, climb 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +10 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d10+3 piercing plus Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 slashing

**Maul** <actions string="Single Action" />  The leopard makes two claw Strikes against a creature it has grabbed. Both count toward its multiple attack penalty, but the penalty increases only after both attacks are made.

**Pounce** <actions string="Single Action" />  The leopard Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the leopard began this action hidden, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The leopard deals 1d4 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

</column>
